name: Atsu and Fri Demo
description:
This is a short demo for a game I'm working on to show off the main mechanics. Use Atsu and Fri's unique abilities to search for objects and solve puzzles. I would appreciate any feedback or thoughts you have on this prototype!

-Controls-
Arrow keys or WASD - Walk
Space - Jump
Shift - Switch Characters
R - Examine
Q - Talk
Mouse - Select Item

(With Item Selected)
E - Use Item

(With Item Selected when Atsu and Fri are together)
E - Trade
R - Examine Item

-Credits-
Sound Effects - Kenney
Music - Bodhisattva by @HALFASSER
Forrester Typeface - Future Fonts
Quandary Typeface - @6Feet_Short

I created everything else.
